Class.name: Report.INWE
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.INWE.Company as INWE_Company,SQLUser.INWE.Item,SQLUser.INWE.Location as ReceiveLocation,SQLUser.INWE.StockLocation,SQLUser.INWE.GoodsReceipt,SQLUser.INWE.Quantity,SQLUser.INWE.UnitPriceBASE,SQLUser.INWE.ItemOrigUnitPrice as ItemOriginalUnitPrice,SQLUser.INWE.ItemGroup,SQLUser.INWE.SearchName,SQLUser.INWE.CustomerText,SQLUser.INWE.ItemUOM,SQLUser.WWW0121.LocationName,SQLUser.INWE.UseableUntilDate,SQLUser.WWW0121.Company,SQLUser.WWW0121.Location,SQLUser.INWE.LotNo from SQLUser.INWE,SQLUser.WWW0121 where (WWW0121.Company = INWE.Company) AND (WWW0121.Location = INWE.Location)
